channel.title: How can i make Npc'c don't attack me when i come near them?
channel.description: Ok in my server when i get near a Npc it suddenly attacks me... how can I fix it and don't let it attack me -.-

item.title: How can i make Npc'c don't attack me when i come near them?
item.dc:creator: @pk_george1 pk george1
item.description:
@pk_george1 wrote:

Hello,

I think you have to make then none agressive so go into your npchandler and search the npc id and remove it from the agressive section

Read full topic
item.source: How can i make Npc'c don't attack me when i come near them?
